cards.title: 简介
cards.body:
[![NPM version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/stylus.svg?style=flat)](https://npmjs.org/package/stylus)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/stylus.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/stylus)
[![Repo Dependents](https://badgen.net/github/dependents-repo/stylus/stylus)](https://github.com/stylus/stylus/network/dependents)
[![Github repo](https://badgen.net/badge/icon/Github?icon=github&label)](https://github.com/stylus/stylus)

cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 本备忘单旨在快速理解 [stylus](https://github.com/stylus/stylus) 所涉及的主要概念，显示了它的常用方法使用清单

cards.title: 介绍
cards.body:
为 Node.js 构建的富有表现力、健壮、功能丰富的 [CSS](./css.md) 语言

• [CSS 备忘清单](./css.md) _(jaywcjlove.github.io)_
• [在线编译预览](https://stylus-lang.com/try.html) _(stylus-lang.com)_

```bash
# npm
$ npm install stylus -g
# pnpm
$ pnpm add -g stylus
```

在 Node.js 环境中使用 `stylus`

```bash
$ stylus one.styl two.styl
# stylus 从标准输入读取并输出到标准输出
$ stylus --compress < some.styl > some.css
# 将 css 目录中的文件编译输出到 `public/css`
$ stylus css --out public/css
```

转换 CSS，输出 `*.styl` 文件

```
$ stylus --css < test.css > test.styl
$ stylus --css test.css /tmp/out.styl
```

cards.title: 支持 CSS 嵌套语法
支持类 python 缩进语法
cards.body:
```stylus
.box
  color: blue
  .button
    color: red
```

也有效！冒号也是可选的。这通常用于 Stylus 文档的语法

cards.title: 混合 Mixins
cards.body:
```stylus
caps-type()
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
```

```stylus {2}
h5
  caps-type()
```

编译 css 为：

```css
h5 {
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}
```

另见：下面[Mixins](#混合-Mixins)

cards.title: 变量 Variables
cards.body:
```stylus
royal-blue = #36a
```

```stylus
div
  color: royal-blue
```

标识符（变量名、函数等）也可以包括 `$` 字符

```stylus
$font-size = 14px
body {
  font: $font-size sans-serif;
}
```

另见：[变量 Variables](https://stylus-lang.com/docs/variables.html)

cards.title: 没有参数
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
red-border()
  border: solid 2px red
```

```stylus {2}
div
  red-border()
```

另见: [Mixins](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/mixins.html)

cards.title: 有参数
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
border-radius(n)
  -webkit-border-radius: n
  border-radius: n
```

```stylus {2,3}
div
  border-radius: 2px
  border-radius(2px)
```

Mixins can be applied in two different ways.

cards.title: 参数默认值
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
border-radius(n = 2px)
  -webkit-border-radius: n
```

cards.title: 块混合
Rest 参数
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
shadow(offset-x, args...)
  box-shadow: offset-x args
  margin-top: offset-x
```

```stylus
#login
  shadow: 1px 2px 5px #eee
```

另见: [Rest 参数](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/vargs.html)

cards.title: 函数 Functions
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
add(a, b)
  a + b
```

```stylus {2}
body
  padding: add(10px, 5)
```

另见: [Functions](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/functions.html)

cards.title: 参数默认值
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
add(a, b = 2)
  a + b
```

另见: [参数默认值](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/functions.html#argument-defaults)

cards.title: 命名参数
cards.body:
```stylus
shadow(x, y)
  x y (y * 1.5) #000
```

```stylus {2}
.button
  box-shadow: shadow(x: 2, y: 4)
```

另见: [命名参数](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/functions.html#named-parameters)

cards.title: 多个返回值
cards.body:
```stylus {2}
sizes()
  8px 16px
```

```stylus
sizes()[0]  // → 8px
sizes()[1]  // → 16px
```

另见: [多个返回值](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/functions.html#multiple-return-values)

cards.title: arguments
cards.body:
```stylus
sum()
  n = 0
  for num in arguments
    n = n + num
```

```stylus
sum(1,2,3,4,5) // => 15
```

参数 local 可用于所有函数体，并包含所有传递的参数

cards.title: hash 示例
cards.body:
```stylus
get(hash, key)
  return pair[1] if pair[0] == key for pair in hash

hash = (one 1) (two 2) (three 3)

get(hash, two)
// => 2
```

cards.title: 条件赋值
cards.body:
```stylus {2}
royal-blue = #36a
royal-blue ?= #89f
```

```stylus
div
  color: royal-blue  // #36a
```

`?=` 只会在之前未设置的情况下设置变量

另见: [条件赋值](https://stylus-lang.com/docs/operators.html#conditional-assignment--)

cards.title: 属性查找
cards.body:
```stylus {2,3}
.logo
  width: w = 150
  margin-left: -(w / 2)
  // or
  height: 80px
  margin-top: -(@height / 2)
```

另见: [属性查找](https://stylus-lang.com/docs/variables.html#property-lookup)

cards.title: 插值
cards.body:
```stylus
-{prefix}-border-radius: 2px
```

另见: [Interpolation](https://stylus-lang.com/docs/interpolation.html)

cards.title: Casting
cards.body:
```stylus
n = 5px
```

```stylus {1,2}
foo: (n)em
foo: (n * 5)%
```

cards.title: Lookup
cards.body: %60%60%60stylus%20%7B3%7D%0Alight-blue%20%3D%20%233bd%0Aname%20%3D%20'blue'%0Alookup('light-'%20%2B%20name)%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5Blookup%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Fbifs.html%23lookupname)

cards.title: %E6%9C%89%E6%9D%A1%E4%BB%B6%E7%9A%84
cards.body: %60%60%60stylus%0Aif%20color%20%3D%3D%20blue%0A%20%20display%3A%20block%0Aelse%20if%20true%20and%20true%0A%20%20display%3A%20inline%0Aelse%20if%20'hey'%20is%20not%20'bye'%0A%20%20display%3A%20flex%0Aelse%0A%20%20display%3A%20none%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%88%AB%E5%90%8D%3A%0A%0A%3A-%20%7C%20%3A-%0A%3A-%20%7C%20%3A-%0A%7C%20%60%3D%3D%60%20%7C%20%60is%60%20%7C%0A%7C%20%60!%3D%60%20%7C%20%60is%20not%60%20%7C%0A%7C%20%60!%3D%60%20%7C%20%60isnt%60%20%7C%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5BConditionals%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Ffunctions.html%23conditionals)

cards.title: 定义检查
cards.body:
```stylus {1}
if ohnoes is defined
  color: blue
```

另见: [is defined](https://stylus-lang.com/docs/operators.html#variable-definition-is-defined)

cards.title: %E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5
cards.body: %60%60%60stylus%0Aif%20val%20is%20a%20'string'%0Aif%20val%20is%20a%20'ident'%0Aif%20%23fff%20is%20a%20'rgba'%20%20%20%20%2F%2F%20%E2%86%92%20true%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5BInstance%20check%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Foperators.html%23instance-check-is-a)

cards.title: 颜色函数
cards.body:
```stylus
alpha(#fff)   //→ 1
alpha(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2))   //→ 0.2
```

```stylus
dark(black)  //→ true
light(black) //→ false
```

```stylus
hue(#0a0)         //→ 50deg
saturation(#f00)  //→ 100%
lightness(#f00)   //→ 50%
luminosity(#f00)  //→ 0.2126
```

```stylus
hue(#0a0, 0deg)
saturation(#f00, 50%)
lightness(#f00)
```

```stylus
lighten(color, 10%)
darken(color, 10%)
saturate(color, 10%)
desaturate(color, 10%)
invert(color)
```

```stylus
tint(color, 50%)  // mix with white
shade(color, 50%) // mix with black
```

```stylus
unquote(string)
```

另见: [Built-in functions](http://stylus-lang.com/docs/bifs.html)

cards.title: %E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87%E5%B0%BA%E5%AF%B8
cards.body: %E8%BF%94%E5%9B%9E%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%9B%BE%E5%83%8F%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%BD%E5%BA%A6%E5%92%8C%E9%AB%98%E5%BA%A6%0A%0A%60%60%60stylus%0Awidth%3A%20%20image-size('tux.png')%5B0%5D%0Aheight%3A%20image-size('tux.png')%5B1%5D%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5Bimage-size%5D(http%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Fbifs.html%23image-sizepath)

cards.title: Embed%20URL
cards.body: %60%60%60%0Abackground%3A%20embedurl('logo.png')%0A%2F%2F%20%E2%86%92%20background%3A%20url(%22data%3Aimage%2Fpng%3Bbase64%2C%E2%80%A6%22)%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5Bembedurl%5D(http%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Fbifs.html%23embedurlpath-encoding)

cards.title: %E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7
cards.body: %60%60%60stylus%0Agradient(color)%0A%20%20add-property('background-image'%2C%20linear-gradient(top%2C%20color%2C%20darken(color%2C%2020%25)))%0A%20%20color%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60stylus%0Abody%0A%20%20background%3A%20gradient(red)%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E5%8F%A6%E8%A7%81%3A%20%5Badd-property%5D(http%3A%2F%2Fstylus-lang.com%2Fdocs%2Fbifs.html%23add-propertyname-expr)
